major_findings.title: 101 components lack accessibility attributes
major_findings.description: Missing aria-labels, alt text, or other a11y features
major_findings.recommendation: Add ARIA labels and alt text to improve accessibility

major_findings.title: Insufficient input validation on AI calls
major_findings.description: Not all AI integrations validate input data (10/37)
major_findings.recommendation: Add schema validation before sending data to AI models

major_findings.title: Unsafe AI Temperature Settings
major_findings.description: Found 36 AI calls without explicit low-temperature settings (risk of hallucinations).

major_findings.title: Missing Grounding Instructions
major_findings.description: Found 36 AI prompts without grounding constraints.
major_findings.recommendation: Include 'only use provided context' or similar constraints in prompts.

major_findings.title: Missing Response Validation
major_findings.description: Found 33 AI calls without response validation.
major_findings.recommendation: Implement schema validation or parsing for AI outputs to catch malformed responses.

major_findings.title: Insufficient Fallback Behavior
major_findings.description: Less than 50% of AI calls have fallback logic (0/37).
major_findings.recommendation: Implement graceful degradation with default responses when AI calls fail.

minor_findings.title: Potential Denormalization: 'employees'
minor_findings.recommendation: Consider standardizing schema or splitting tables.

minor_findings.title: No explicit API versioning
minor_findings.description: Endpoints do not use /v1/ or similar prefixes.

minor_findings.title: 51 hardcoded color values detected
minor_findings.description: Colors should use design tokens/CSS variables
minor_findings.recommendation: Migrate hardcoded colors to design system tokens

minor_findings.title: 1041 hardcoded spacing values
minor_findings.description: Spacing should use design tokens (e.g., Tailwind classes)
minor_findings.recommendation: Use consistent spacing scale from design system

minor_findings.title: Incomplete AI error handling
minor_findings.description: Some AI calls lack proper error handling (0/37)
minor_findings.recommendation: Wrap AI calls in try-catch with fallback logic

minor_findings.title: Missing Security Policy
minor_findings.recommendation: Add a SECURITY.md to define reporting procedures.

minor_findings.description: No ADR or architectural documentation found for the 'analytics' module.
minor_findings.recommendation: Create an ADR summarizing the module's purpose and key decisions.
